name: Ominous Banner
icon: minecraft:white_banner{BlockEntityTag: {Patterns: [{Pattern: "mr", Color: 9}, {Pattern: "bs", Color: 8}, {Pattern: "cs", Color: 7}, {Pattern: "bo", Color: 8}, {Pattern: "ms", Color: 15}, {Pattern: "hh", Color: 8}, {Pattern: "mc", Color: 8}, {Pattern: "bo", Color: 15}]}, display: {Name: {"color":"gold","translate":"block.minecraft.ominous_banner"}}}

pages.item: minecraft:white_banner{HideFlags: 32,BlockEntityTag: {Patterns: [{Pattern: "mr", Color: 9}, {Pattern: "bs", Color: 8}, {Pattern: "cs", Color: 7}, {Pattern: "bo", Color: 8}, {Pattern: "ms", Color: 15}, {Pattern: "hh", Color: 8}, {Pattern: "mc", Color: 8}, {Pattern: "bo", Color: 15}]},display:{Name:'\"Ominous Banner\"'} }
pages.text: $(li)The Omnious Banner is the Illager's Flag which symbolizing the nation of the Illagers.$(br)$(li)This item can only be dropped by the leader of the $(l:patchouli:illagers/pillager)Pillagers$(/l) on death which can be found in a $(l:patchouli:illagers/patrol)Patrol$(/l).
$(li)Defend the village from various waves of Illagers and you will become the $(l)Hero of the Village$().
